cross

public Vector cross(IVector vector)
the cross product of two vectors if defined the cross product of 2 2d vectors is usually (0,0,z) the corresponding 2d vector is (0,0) hence the function will always return (0,0)

Specified by:
cross in interface IVector
Returns:
a vector as a result of the operation
